Verses: 1 pinbu, Laabaanudaiya Kumaarar: Engal Thagappanukku Undaanavaigal Yaavaiyum Yaakkobu Eduththukkondaan Endrum, Engal Thagappanudaiya Porulinaale Indhach Selvaththaiyellaam Adaindhaan Endrum Sonna Vaarththaigalai Yaakkobu Kettaan.
2 laabaanin Mugaththai Yaakkobu Paarththapodhu, Adhu Netru Mundhainaal Irundhadhupol Iraamal Verupattirukkak Kandaan.
3 karththar Yaakkobai Nokki: Un Pidhaakkaludaiya Dhesaththirkum Un Inaththaaridaththirkum Nee Thirumpippo; Naan Unnodekooda Iruppen Endraar.
4 appozhudhu Yaakkobu, Raagelaiyum Leyaalaiyum Veliyile Than Mandhaiyidaththil Azhaippiththu,
5 avargalai Nokki: Ungal Thagappanudaiya Mugam Netru Mundhainaal Irundhadhupola Irukkavillai Endru Enakkuth Thondrugiradhu; Aanaalum En Thagappanudaiya Dhevan Ennodekooda Irukkiraar.
6 ennaal Iyandramattum Naan Ungal Thagappanukku Oozhiyanjeydhen Endru Neengal Arindhirukkireergal.
7 ungal Thagappano, Ennai Vanjiththu, En Sambalaththaip Paththumurai Maatrinaan; Aanaalum Avan Enakkuth Theenguseyya Dhevan Avanukku Idankodukkavillai.

8 pulliyullavaigal Un Sambalamaayirukkum Endru Avan Sonnapodhu, Aadugalellaam Pulliyulla Kuttigalaip Pottadhu; Kalappu Niramaanavaigal Un Sambalamaayirukkum Endru Avan Sonnapodhu, Aadugalellaam Kalappunirak Kuttigalaip Pottadhu.
9 ivvidhamaai Dhevan Ungal Thagappanudaiya Aadugalai Eduththu, Enakkuth Thandhaar.
10 aadugal Poliyum Kaalaththile Naan Kanda Soppanaththil En Kangalai Ereduththup Paarkkumpodhu, Aadugalode Poliyum Kadaakkal Kalappu Niramum Pulliyum Variyum Ullavaigalaayirukkak Kanden.
11 andriyum Dhevadhoodhan Oruvar Soppanaththil: Yaakkobe Endraar; Idho, Irukkiren Endren.
12 appozhudhu Avar: Un Kangalai Ereduththuppaar; Aadugalode Poliyum Kadaakkalellaam Kalappuniramum Pulliyum Variyumullavaigalaai Irukkiradhu; Laabaan Unakkuch Seygira Yaavaiyum Kanden.

13 nee Thoonukku Abishegam Seydhu, Enakku Oru Poruththanaiyaip Pannina Beththelile Unakkuth Dharisanamaana Dhevan Naane; Ippozhudhu Nee Ezhundhu, Indhath Dhesaththaivittup Purappattu, Un Inaththaarirukkira Dhesaththirkuth Thirumpippo Endru Sonnaar Endraan.
14 adharku Raagelum Leyaalum: Engal Thagappan Veettile Ini Engalukkup Pangum Sudhandharamum Undo?
15 avaraal Naangal Anniyaraai Ennappadavillaiyaa? Avar Engalai Vitru, Engal Panaththaiyum Vaayile Pottukkondaar.
16 aagaiyaal Dhevan Engal Thagappanidaththilirundhu Eduththa Aisuvariyam Ellaam Namakkum Nammudaiya Pillaigalukkum Uriyadhu; Ippadiyirukka, Dhevan Umakkuch Sonnapadiyellaam Seyyum Endraargal.
17 appozhudhu Yaakkobu Ezhundhu, Than Pillaigalaiyum Than Manaivigalaiyum Ottakangalmel Etri,

18 thaan Padhaan Araamile Sambaadhiththa Mirugajeevangalaagiya Mandhaigal Anaiththaiyum Than Porulkal Ellaavatraiyum Eduththukkondu, Kaanaan Dhesaththil Irukkira Than Thagappanaagiya Eesaakkinidaththukkup Pogap Purappattaan.
19 laabaan, Than Aadugalai Mayirgaththarikkap Poyirundhaan; Andhach Samayaththile Raagel Than Thagappanudaiya Suroopangalaith Thirudikkondaal.
20 yaakkobu Thaan Odippogiradhaich Seeriyanaagiya Laabaanukku Ariviyaamal, Thiruttalavaaip Poivittaan.
21 ippadiye Avan Thanakku Undaanavaigalaiyellaam Eduththukkondu, Aatraik Kadandhu, Keeleyaadh Malaiyai Nokki Odipponaan.
22 yaakkobu Odipponadhu Moondraam Naalile Laabaanukku Arivikkappattadhu.
23 appozhudhu Avan, Than Sagodhararaik Koottikkondu, Ezhunaal Pirayaanapariyandham Avanaith Thodarndhupoi, Keeleyaadh Malaiyile Avanaik Kandupidiththaan.
24 andru Raaththiri Dhevan Seeriyaa Dhesaththaanaagiya Laabaanukkuch Soppanaththil Thondri: Nee Yaakkopode Nanmaiye Andrith Theemai Ondrum Pesaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayiru Endraar.
25 laabaan Yaakkobinidaththil Vandhaan; Yaakkobu Malaiyile Than Koodaaraththaip Pottirundhaan; Laabaanum Than Sagodhararodekoodak Keeleyaadh Malaiyile Koodaaram Pottaan.
26 appozhudhu Laabaan Yaakkobai Nokki: Nee Thiruttalavaaip Purappattu, En Kumaaraththigalai Yuththaththil Pidiththa Siraigalaippolak Konduvandhadhu Enna Seygai?
27 nee Odippovadhai Maraiththu, Enakku Ariviyaamal, Thiruttalavaai Ennidaththilirundhu Vandhuvittadhu Enna? Naan Unnaich Sandhoshamaai, Sangeedham Meladhaalam Kinnaramuzhakkaththudane Anuppuvene.
28 en Pillaigalaiyum En Kumaaraththigalaiyum Naan Muththanjeyya Vidaamal Ponadhenna? Indhach Seygaiyai Nee Madhiyillaamal Seydhaai.

29 ungalukkup Pollaappuch Seyya Enakku Vallamai Undu; Aagilum, Ungal Thagappanudaiya Dhevan: Nee Yaakkopode Nanmaiye Andrith Theemai Ondrum Pesaadhapadikku Echcharikkaiyaayiru Endru Netru Raaththiri Ennode Sonnaar.
30 ippozhudhum Un Thagappanudaiya Veettinmelulla Vaanjaiyinaal Nee Purappattuppogiradhaanaal Pogalaam, En Dheyvangalai En Thirudikkondupogiraai Endru Kettaan.
31 yaakkobu Laabaanukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Ummudaiya Kumaaraththigalaip Palaadhkaaramaaip Pidiththu Vaiththukkolveer Endru Naan Anjinadhinaale Ippadi Vandhuvitten.

32 aanaalum Yaaridaththil Ummudaiya Dheyvangalaik Kandupidikkireero, Avanai Uyirode Vidavendaam; Ummudaiya Porulgal Edhaavadhu En Vasaththil Undaanaal Neer Adhai Nammudaiya Sagodhararukku Munbaagap Parisodhiththarindhu, Adhai Eduththukkollum Endraan. Raagel Avaigalaith Thirudikkonduvandhadhai Yaakkobu Ariyaadhirundhaan.

33 appozhudhu Laabaan Yaakkobin Koodaaraththilum, Leyaalin Koodaaraththilum, Irandu Velaikkaarigalin Koodaaraththilum Piravesiththup Paarththum Ondrum Kandupidikkavillai; Pinbu, Leyaalin Koodaaraththaivittu Raagelin Koodaaraththukkup Ponaan.
34 raagel Andhach Suroobangalai Eduththu, Ottagach Senaththinkeezh Vaiththu, Adhinmel Utkaarndhirundhaal. Laabaan Koodaaram Engum Thadavippaarththum, Avaigalaik Kandupidikkavillai.

35 aval Than Thagappanai Nokki: En Aandavanaagiya Umakku Munbaaga Naan Ezhundhiraadhadhaikkuriththuk Kobankollavendaam; Sthireegalukkulla Vazhipaadu Enakku Undaayirukkiradhu Endraal; Appadiye Avan Andhach Suroobangalaith Thediyum Kandupidikkavillai.
36 appozhudhu Yaakkobukkuk Kobam Ezhumbi, Laabaanode Vaakkuvaadhampanni: Neer Ennai Ivvalavu Ukkiramaaith Thodarndhuvarumpadikku Naan Seydha Thappidham Enna? Naan Seydha Dhurogam Enna?

37 en Thattumuttugalaiyellaam Thadavippaarththeere; Ummudaiya Veettuth Thattumuttugalil Ennaththaik Kandupidiththeer? Adhai Ennudaiya Sagodhararukkum Ummudaiya Sagodhararukkum Munbaaga Inge Vaiyum; Avargal Enakkum Umakkum Naduththeerkkattum.
38 indha Irubadhu Varushakaalamaai Naan Ummidaththil Irundhen; Ummudaiya Semmariyaadugalum Vellaadugalum Sinaiyazhiyavillai; Ummudaiya Mandhaiyin Kadaakkalai Naan Thinnavillai.
39 peerundadhai Naan Ummidaththukkuk Konduvaraamal, Adharkaaga Naan Uththaravaadhampanninen; Pagalil Kalavuponadhaiyum, Iravil Kalavuponadhaiyum En Kaiyil Kettu Vaangineer.
40  Pagalile Veyilum Iravile Kulirum Ennaip Patchiththadhu; Niththirai En Kangalukkuth Dhooramaayirundhadhu; Ivvidhamaaip Paadupatten.

41 indha Irubadhu Varushakaalam Ummudaiya Veettile Irundhen; Padhinaalu Varusham Ummudaiya Irandu Kumaaraththigalukkaagavum, Aaru Varusham Ummudaiya Mandhaikkaagavum Ummidaththil Seviththen; Paththumurai En Sambalaththai Maatrineer.

42 en Pidhaavin Dhevanaagiya Aabiragaamin Dhevanum Eesaakkin Bayabakthikkuriyavarum Ennodiraamarponaal, Neer Ippozhudhu Ennai Verumaiyaai Anuppivittiruppeer; Dhevan En Sirumaiyaiyum En Kaippirayaasaththaiyum Paarththu, Netru Raaththiri Ummaik Kadindhukondaar Endru Sonnaan.

43 appozhudhu Laabaan Yaakkobukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Indhak Kumaaraththigal En Kumaaraththigal, Indhap Pillaigal En Pillaigal, Indha Mandhai En Mandhai; Nee Kaangira Yaavum Ennudaiyavaigal; En Kumaaraththigalaagiya Ivargalaiyum, Ivargal Petra Pillaigalaiyum Indru Naan Enna Seyyakkoodum?
44 ippozhudhum Enakkum Unakkum Saatchiyaayirukkumporuttu, Neeyum Naanum Udanpadikkaipannikkollakkadavom Endraan.
45 appozhudhu Yaakkobu Oru Kallai Eduththu, Adhaith Thoonaaga Niruththinaan.
46 pinnum Yaakkobu Than Sagodhararaip Paarththu, Karkalaik Kuviyalaagach Serungal Endraan; Avargal Karkalai Eduththukkonduvandhu, Oru Kuviyalaakki, Andhak Kuviyalinmel Pojanampanninaargal.
47  Laabaan Adharku Jegarsagadhoodhaa Endru Perittaan; Yaakkobu Adharkuk Kalayedh Endru Perittaan.
48 indhak Kuviyal Indru Enakkum Unakkum Saatchi Endru Laabaan Sonnapadiyinaale, Adhin Per Kalayedh Ennappattadhu.

49 allaamalum Avan: Naam Oruvarai Oruvar Vittu Maraindhapin, Nee En Kumaaraththigalaith Thuyarappaduththi, Avargalaiyallaamal Vere Sthireegalai Vivaagampanninaayaanaal, Karththar Enakkum Unakkum Nadunindru Kankaanikkakkadavar;
51  Pinnum Laabaan Yaakkobai Nokki: Idho, Indhak Kuviyalaiyum Enakkum Unakkum Naduvaaga Naan Niruththina Thoonaiyum Paar.

52 theengu Seyya Naan Indhak Kuviyalaik Kadandhu Unnidaththukku Varaadhapadikkum, Nee Indhak Kuviyalaiyum Indhath Thoonaiyum Katandhu Ennidaththukku Varaadhapadikkum Indhak Kuviyalum Saatchi, Indhath Thoonum Saatchi.

53 aabiragaamin Dhevanum Naagorin Dhevanum Avargal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanumaayirukkiravar Namakkulle Nadunindru Niyaayantheerppaaraaga Endraan. Appozhudhu Yaakkobu Than Thagappanaagiya Eesaakkin Bayabakdhikkuriyavarmel Aanaiyittaan.
54  Pinbu, Yaakkobu Malaiyinmel Baliyittu, Pojanampannumpadi Than Sagodhararai Azhaiththaan; Appadiye Avargal Pojanampanni Malaiyile Raaththanginaargal.
55 laabaan Adhigaalame Ezhundhirundhu, Than Kumaararaiyum Than Kumaaraththigalaiyum Muththanjeydhu, Avargalai Aaseervadhiththaan. Pinbu Laabaan Purappattu, Than Idaththukkuth Thirumpipponaan.
